feed.title: ~/arindas - segmented-log
feed.subtitle: arindas' personal website and blog for ruminating on their place and purpose in the tech world.

entry.title: Building Segmented Logs in Rust: From Theory to Production!
entry.summary: Explore a Rust implementation of the persistence mechanism behind message-queues and write-ahead-logs in databases. Embark on a journey from the theoretical underpinnings to a production grade implementation of the segmented-log data structure.
